title: The Raani Haar Set: Polki Diamond & Pearl Symphony with Jhumkas
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds (పోల్కి వజ్రాలు) with exceptional fire
South Sea Pearls (ముత్యాలు) with a lustrous finish
features: Exquisite Raani Haar design featuring floral and paisley motifs intricately set with uncut Polki diamonds. A central Emerald Cabochon pendant is surrounded by Polki diamonds and cascading South Sea Pearls. The Jhumka earrings echo the floral motif with a matching Ruby accent and suspended Pearl. The setting showcases traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
colors: Predominantly white (Polki diamonds) with gold accents
complemented by the vivid green of the Emerald and the subtle red of the Ruby. The South Sea pearls add a creamy white contrast.
occasions: and other grand events (వేడుకలు). Ideal for brides seeking a traditional yet luxurious look. Suitable for Muhurtham
description: This Raani Haar set is a timeless heirloom piece (వంశపారంపర్య ఆభరణం), showcasing the opulence of Polki diamonds and the elegance of South Sea pearls. The intricate Hyderabadi craftsmanship guarantees exceptional quality and durability. The blend of traditional design and modern setting makes it a versatile statement piece. The high-quality materials ensure lasting value and beauty.
